name: Koku The Shikoku
description: Koku the Shikoku is a meme coin. He is from the Edo Era and is a valiant member of the Ronin Network. His gambling spirit defines his digital existence. Koku's day begins with a big bowl of Udon noodles, followed by games like Hanafuda or Menko, but Cho-Han is his favourite, as he loves rolling the dice! Koku is the true symbol of Gamba and has his sights on being the number dog on Ronin Network.
